# Hyeokgi Kim Portfolio

Summary: Undergraduate ECE student focused on applied machine learning, generative AI, and medical imaging.
Location: Seoul National University
Contact: ryan0905@snu.ac.kr
GitHub: https://github.com/grenademeister

## Primary Pages
- Minimal HTML portfolio: /
- Interactive React portfolio: /react.html

## Education
- Seoul National University — Electrical & Computer Engineering (2024 - Present), GPA 4.17 / 4.3
- Gyeonggi Science High School for the Gifted — Physics Track (Graduated 2023), GPA 4.27 / 4.3

## Skills
- AI Research: PyTorch, TensorFlow, HuggingFace Transformers, OpenAI Gym, scikit-learn, MATLAB
- Software Engineering: Python, C/C++, JavaScript (React), Git, Linux

## Projects
- Longitudinal MRI reconstruction with Diffusion/Flow Models (2025)
- Hardware-Aware Sequentialization of CNN Kernels (2025)
- Rainbow DQN Tetris Agent (2025)
- Transformer from Scratch on Edge NPU (2024)
- Analytic Model of Horizontal Brazil Nut Effect (2023)
- One-shot object detection with DINOv3 (2025)
- Long-horizon Pokemon gameplay agent (2025)
- Solar radiance prediction model (2025)

## Experience & Honors
- Research Intern, LIST, Seoul National University (May 2025 ~ February 2026)
- Student Member, DEEPEST (Research Group) (Since 2025)
- STEM National Scholarship, Korea Student Aid Foundation (Since 2024)
